content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Smelting Area
Consists of three stone furnaces for smelting copper:
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0) 
- Furnace 3 at position(4.0, 4.0)

### Copper Cable Production Line
Located around position(9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 for making copper cables
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing mixed materials
- Two burner inserters:
  - At position(7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
  - At position(11.5, 11.5) moving items from assembler to output chest

### Storage Area
Multiple chests around position(12.5-16.5, 11.5):
- Chest at (14.5, 11.5) storing iron plates (full)
- Chest at (16.5, 11.5) storing copper plates

### Power Generation System
Located around position(-7.0, 24.5):
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected by pipe networks for water and steam
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Pack System
Located around position(0.5, 30.5):
- Lab for research
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing science packs
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) feeding lab from chest

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Monitor fuel levels in boilers and furnaces regularly to prevent "out of fuel" warnings
- Keep sufficient coal in inventory before attempting to refuel machines

### Inventory Management
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items into machines
- Clear blocked items from ground promptly to maintain efficiency

### Machine Operation
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor machine status for warnings about missing resources
